name: Capital Realty Group River Region LLC
text:
Mike and Barbara,

Just a quick note to THANK YOU For the FANTASTIC & PROFESSIONAL MARKETING SERVICES that you both continually provide to Our REALTORS® at Capital Realty Group River Region!

Our Broker and Owner, Kitty Wasserman, LOVES The Company Agent name tags that were Custom Created Especially For Our Team! -  Every Detail of Our Logo, including the "R" and river "waves" were artfully expressed in an Outstanding manner!

Also important -
is VERY REASONABLE Pricing for the Quality Services that you provide!

Thank You Both Again for your OUTSTANDING SERVICE with a Smile!!!

Sincerely,
John Moseley, REALTOR®
Marketing Director for:
Capital Realty Group River Region, LLC

resp.text: Thank you

name: Kimyarda Jones
text: During the Christmas season on a Friday when the streets are very busy I got off of work early to get a plaque for my in-laws engraved, no one was there.  There was no sign or any indication that no one was in the building except the lights being off. The sign posted on the door and all of the internet signage says they close at 4:30 I arrived at exactly 4. When I call to ask was anyone there I was told, Sorry we had to leave early. I explained my issue with hopes of them offering me a better time to come back or a discount I was told ....again with less compassion than the first time sorry for the inconvenience. I work 9 to 5 Monday through Friday when they are open I had to make special arrangements for that time off. They clearly don't care so I went to Furlongs. They were there. The work is beautiful and was fast.   I was also treated with a discount for this company's grave inconsideration for PAYING customers Edit: I originally gave 2 stars without comment, but after being harrassed for my rating I dropped to one. As a business owner I cannot stress the importance of time management and customer service satisfaction. It is a fine line, but it must be walked.

resp.text: Kimyarda, you came after 4PM on Friday and found us closed. As we explained to you by phone and email, we had to close that day a little early due to something that came up. We were taking food to a family who’s mom had surgery. We hadn’t talked to you and we’re not expecting you or we could have made other arrangements to meet you later or another time after hours. Again we apologize for your inconvenience

name: Summer Kindle
text: Excellent quality and friendly service! Highly recommend!!

name: Theresa Hull
text: Great work and great service on short notice. I would highly recommend this company and will use them in the future!

name: Andrea Forman
text: I needed an engraved gift for boss's day and they were the only shop who was friendly and could get the job done the same day! Great quality and fast,  friendly service!  Highly recommended.

name: A W Brakeley
text: USAF Active Duty.  I needed a Dress Shirt nametag ASAP, after losing it on the way to Maxwell AFB.  I gave this store a call, and within 45 minutes he had a brand new one made up for me, with plenty of time for me to get back to base and attend my fiancee's graduation, looking sharp.  I could not have been luckier to find this place, and the other work inside looked impressively professional.  Thank you for your speed and skill, and if/when I come back through Montgomery, I will definitely be doing business here again.

name: David McCaughtry
text: After a last minute order was dropped in my lap 1st Place Trophy really saved my bacon! Kudos to a top notch business. I will definitely patron them again!

name: Ryan R
text: Excellent service! Quick and friendly couple. Was strapped for time and they were able to meet the short deadline.

name: Mark Williams
text: I picked up some awards and the engraving really popped. I will be back here again. Great service!!

name: Ryan R
text: Excellent service! Quick and friendly couple. Was strapped for time and they were able to meet the short deadline.

name: Mark Williams
text: I picked up some awards and the engraving really popped. I will be back here again. Great service!!

name: Robert Lowery
text:
Fantastic place to get anything and everything Awards or trophy related!!!
Plus anything else for Challenge Coins and Pins!
Great work at low prices!
Kim is the best!!!

name: Mike Richardson
text: Took our money. Never received the products, 3 MONTHS LATER!  We have tried calling,  emailing, and even going by the store. Nobody answers, responds, or was even there. Do NOT buy from these people. Now we’ve got to fight to get our $400+ back!

name: Linda Jacobs
text: I loved the outfits and the music and the presenters.  It was great.

name: Bethaney Gallagher
text: I purchased a knife for my fiancée with the intent of having it engraved somewhere local so I could give it to him for Valentines Day. Well, I procrastinated and finally ended up having to swing in American Awards on 2/14 to see if they’d be able to help me out. Not only were they super super friendly, but they also did a great job on the knife and had it ready for pickup in just a few hours!

name: Christine Maras
text: This company helped find the perfect plaque to honor my son. They were knowledgable and professional. It was delivered on time and exactly what I wanted. I will definitely use them again. Thank you for the help

name: Ray Curvin
text: Wonderful work, expertly done, tasteful, prices are very pleasing too. I highly recommend.

name: Carl Warner
text: A little pricey for a 10 inch piece of wood. Plain and unadorned.

name: Michael ESTRADA (Estrada,M.J)
text: The United States Navy and SERVICE Inc.

name: Rachel Stanislas
text: Crown Trophy never disappoints. Great customer service and great products make this my go to for anything trophy related.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words.  We love our customers and do whatever we can to meet their needs.  Thank you again.

name: Michael Hitt
text: Exceptional customer service! Completed a job for me much faster than anticipated. Highly recommended!

resp.text: Thank you.  We appreciate your review.

name: Bobby DeHaye
text: Great people to work  with! Our baseball team won the State Championships and we needed trophies for our players and coaches within a short period of time. Crown Trophy did what they promised and had our trophies completed on time! Thank you!

resp.text: It was our pleasure, and congratulations again to you and your team.

name: Melissa Walker
text: Gus and his staff go above and beyond when it comes to customer service. I wasn't sure of the exact product my government customer needed, but Gus gave me excellent guidance. And the turnaround time was amazing! I needed a major change, and it was taken care of immediately, with no additional cost. Their prices are ridiculously affordable, too. I will definitely use Crown Trophy again and recommend them to anyone needing trophies, plaques, awards, etc!

name: Crystal Alexander
text: I needed trophies on the spur of the moment..the owner graciously and very kindhearted helped me choose and engrave each trophy without any prejudice.   He simply said give me about an hour....and he was true to his words.  AWESOME COMPANY!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Terrie Littrell
text: We were in a bind and Gus came through for us. He knows his trophies and medals!  Will be using them regularly moving forward.  Very happy!

name: Ricardo Rivera
text: Very Professional, responsive and reasonably priced.  They turned around an engraving request in 10 minutes.  They have won over my loyalty.

name: Daniel Shrider
text: Staff is very helpful and knowledgeable. And the prices are very reasonable.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Doug Swafford
text: Best trophy shop around.  Period.

name: Chris Martin
text: Prices very reasonable and jobs completed in a timely manner!!!

name: Nate Wilcox
text: Always helpful and able to make deadlines.

name: Mark Hall
text: Gus helped me pick out the trophies, gave me the total and had them ready when he said he would, thats all a person can ask.

name: michelle clark
text: Great place. My products turn out fantastic, and was done very fast too!

name: Mark Green
text: Lights are on but nobody's home! Can't get jimmy to answer the phone, return calls or emails. I guess this business is either closed or on its way to closing. Where am I going to get my t ball team shirts now?

name: Bridgett Babb
text: Great Store, Great People and Great Quality Items

name: Manuel Valentino
text:
(Translated by Google) quality not good

(Original)
calidad no buen

name: Kim S
text: Awesome locally owned and ran bussiness.

name: Jessica WoodD
text: Just was

name: Jon Wiley
text: Great trophies and medals for our teams. Staff is very friendly and knowledgeable.

name: SincerlyTee
text: Yall, listen! I have the best Christmas gift to give because of Stephanie and her thoughtful tricks and talent! Her customer service skills was absolutely something that is not made of anymore in this day in age. Dont shop around for a store like this just choose them, you won't be disappointed 😊 10 stars!!!!!

name: Gerald Crofutt
text: They really did a nice job on laser etching my walnut serving board.  They are now my go to place for plaque design

name: jorge figueroa
text:
Excellent job
Quick
Pleasure to  recommend

name: Jason Hulsey
text: Great service, priced fair I highly recommend this shop for awards / gifts.

name: jim yokem
text:
Friendly service. Quality work at a competitive price.
Almost impossible to find unless you have a map.

name: Jeff Carter
text: Perfect and very fast , you won’t find a better place and the people are very nice  thank you so much for high quality craftsmanship.

name: JJ George
text: Dawn, Stephanie, and Danny are very talented, do incredible work, and are a pleasure to work with!  They deserve more than 5 stars!

name: Vanessa Powell
text: Great products/design & service, every item completed in a timely fashion.

name: Jan Bos
text: Nice sandwiches as usual

name: Jennifer Wingo
text: They are great here in every way!!!

name: Jody Griffin
text: Great place and better service.

name: Ali M
text: They have done so many order for econotechrecyclers.com that I can't even keep up! They are BEYOND awesome!

name: Michael Pettey
text: They are great people that support all of the area's youth sports programs.

resp.text: Thanks so much!!

name: River City Roofing Solutions
text: Fast service. Excellent work.

name: Jasmin S
text: Amazing work & beyond great customer service!

resp.text: Thank you so much Jasmin!!

name: William Lovell
text: good shop

name: Jordan Lovell
text:
Really disappointed in Athens Athletics this year.  They shorted me one Jersey and two hats for youth baseball.  They told me the items would here by opening day.  Long story short, they weren't.  Nobody called, nobody apologized, no explanations were given....  I was told they had ordered me a shirt, but they no longer had the size I needed, so they ordered a different size.  Also, eventually, they told me the hats had never been ordered.

I came today and they refunded me my money that I paid them 2-3 weeks ago.  I still don't have the hats and shirts for everyone :(

resp.text: I apologize that you were not called or apologized too. These hats and jerseys are trademarked and we can’t produce them ourselves because of MLB. When the company is out of stock and tells me they can’t give me a date of when they will be there I chose to get the next size so you would have something for opening day. The hats were ordered originally and shorted from the order so they were reordered. It is not our intention at all for you not to get what you order. If I could print them myself this would not be an issue. Again I apologize for this happening!

name: Michael Muse
text: Great people awesome prices!!!!

name: Renee Davis
text: Friendly service and fast

name: Harlon Warden
text: Very helpful, and willing to listen to the customer wants. Very good people,  love finished trophies.

name: Amanda Handley
text: We order 13 and then realized we needed one more to make 14 so my husband goes to pick the one up and they don’t have a clue where it’s at or anything and the guy got an attitude with me and said I should have ordered the correct amount the 1st time. We will never use the place again! Not professional at all!

name: Scott Plagmann
text: Very professional and very good quality!

name: Justin Wallis
text: Went in to look for team trophies. There was no one upfront to talk to. Looked around for a little while at the old and outdated trophies covered in dust and stepping over boxes and other junk in the floor. Finally a man came from the back and gave the impression of why was I there and why are you bothering me. I asked about ball holder trophies and he kind of waved his hand in a general direction. I left shortly after that and won’t be going back.

name: Jay Floyd
text: Ordered trophies Monday, were told would be ready Friday, they were ready on time for pickup. The boys are going to love them.

name: N Luv
text: Great service and great business. Very professional and great work!!

name: Christopher Mathis
text: Always great work and great customer service

name: Liz Lewis
text: Very disappointed in the service that I received.

name: Richard Bacon
text: love this dynamic place ,always helpful and efficient.Thank you!!

name: Vicki Harris
text: Thank you so much for the help! Samantha helped me find the perfect item and was very nice. Thank you again.

name: Scotty Keenan
text: Polite and quick service. Very accommodating. Quality products.

name: A. Clark
text: I love the wide selection of gift items that can be engraved & customized. They are much more than just a trophy shop.

name: Linda Parker
text: Great service  !!

name: Daron Wallace
text: The staff was great. They really helped me and got everything perfect. Thanks y'all.

resp.text: Thank you for the review. We appreciate your business!

name: John Gregory
text: Very nice people.  Good work. Done when I they said it would be.

name: thomas mitchell
text: Hot never been there

name: Genia Fry
text: They do excellent work!

name: Doug Jordan
text: Do good work and very easy to work with

name: Trae Otwell
text: Friendly, helpful staff that can care for all of your award needs.

name: Champ Ion
text: WOW! Ryan did an outstanding job. I had a special request to put a text message on a plaque as a gift. Came out exactly as I had hoped! Due to privacy I'm only showing the buttom.

resp.text:
Glad to hear you liked it Champ! We always have a good time making custom plaques like these, so keep em' coming!

- Ryan

name: Sally May A
text: Courteous. Helpful. Reasonable prices.

resp.text:
Glad to hear that you had a good experience with us. We look forward to working with you again!

- Ryan

name: Holly Huffington
text: Can't do basic engraving without crooked letters.

resp.text:
I'm very sorry to hear that you have had a bad experience with our awards. It has always been our policy to re-run any engraving that is unsatisfactory to our customers, and in most cases problems like this can be remedied within a few minutes.

Feel free to bring the piece by our store and we will do our best to make things right!

Ryan Kelosky
Owner - Crown Trophy of Pelham, AL

name: Matt Bein
text: Very knowledgeable and professional place to get awards for any event.

resp.text: Thanks for your feedback Matt! We look forward to working with you on your next event.

name: Ever Duarte
text: The best place to buy trophies!!!

resp.text:
Thanks for your feedback Ever!
We're glad to hear that you've had good experiences with our awards, and look forward to working with you again in the future.

name: Moemurda
text: Real nice and helpful staff. Reasonable prices on ttophies. I didn't receive a call once my order was complete other than that i used them services at least once or twice a year .

name: Brady McLaughlin
text: Birmingham Trophy Company has always delivered excellence in customer service, responsiveness, and quality of plaques / awards that I've ordered.  Very timely as well.  Highly recommend!

name: Angels WeddingCreation
text: Excellent experience with Birmingham trophy shop, carnita and Mike are wonderful. I gave them an order yesterday morning  for 18 plaques different names different sayings and they had them ready for me before 10 a.m. the next business day. I highly recommend Birmingham trophy shop for all of your printing needs regarding plaques, trophies ,awards engraving ,whatever you're needing

name: Roy ORR
text: My team LOVED their trophies. The customer service was EXCELLENT and the price was Great thanks to Carnita!!!

name: Charles Parker
text: The plaque is awesome

name: Lisa Allen
text: I didn't go to Birmingham Trophy for a trophy. I went because I was wondering if they could make a custom piece of  brass door hardware that I couldn't find online to order. The owner created one on the fly right then while I waited and didn't even charge me for it. That kind of customer service is incredibly rare! Thanks so much, you're awesome, the piece you created worked great!

name: Toni Brown
text: Grear customer service is what you will find at BTS. Michael and Carnita are the best.

name: Steve Dellinger
text: Good product variety, great service.

name: Brian Elebash
text: They do Great work people are very friendly.

resp.text: Thank you so much,

name: William Deveau
text: They do a really good job here and went out of their way to ensure they got my order right. The owner is also very personable. Definitely use them!

name: Merrill Larsen
text: Fantastic family-owned company that took the time to help me out with a personal gift on short notice, although they were already busy.  Good communication, timely service, and perfect product.  The engravings I had done were exactly what I wanted.  Would absolutely use their company again.  Larry and his wife were very kind and helpful. Highly recommend for quality service and a personal touch!

name: DON LOVE
text: This company has excellent customer service. They are prompt to answer  calls and complete projects. I was impressed with their work and very satisfied with their professional services.

name: Marie Hagen Bermudez
text: I suppose that their work is actually quite nice as is there location away from the main part of the grime of the city. So really their work is excellent and I do like the craftsmanship . However, I do not like the people that own/run the place due to how they treated their daughter-in-law(now ex)  and her family. Basically, Like second class citizens red headed step child like ways.  I recommended  their work not their personalities as I would not go to them if I ever move back to my hometown for this reason. Skeletons in their closets for sure but an air of perfection on the outside.

name: mama me
text: Excellent service...excellent product.  Kindest family you will ever meet.  Strong Christian values they live and work by.  Won't go any where else for awards and engraving.

resp.text: Thank you, Because of Jesus Christ

name: Chennan Xue
text: Much better than Furlong's Engraving

name: Randy Cain
text: Wonderful people, can do anything and really nice work

name: Dave “Santa Dave” Hood
text: For any kind of trophy, plaque, championship rings, these are the guys to call!!

name: Tony Roberts
text: Very friendly folks who work hard at putting a trophy together that they we both could be satisfied with.  Beautiful work!

name: Jacob Brown
text: Great service, great prices and Kustom Made

name: Kay Farley
text: Excellent service

name: Jennifer Lipskoch
text:
This is our 5th or 6th year in a row using American Pride for our end of the year school awards program.  They make everything so easy, and our orders are always correct!  It is nice to know they are here locally for our trophy needs.
Highly recommend this business!

name: April Walker
text: This guy is awesome!! Even when I went in not knowing what I was looking, he had exactly what I wanted!! He's always very kind! Even at times where I needed them in a rush, he never batted an eye, just smiled and said we'll have it ready for you! Out of all the years I've ordered from him I've never had even 1 trophy, medal, plaque, cup, anything messed up, misspelled that are exactly as I ordered!! Prices are very comparable if not cheaper than others in the area.Would highly recommend using them for any and all types of awards!

resp.text: Thank You for the kind words. Always happy to please.

name: David Jones
text: Great source for team and corporate awards.

name: LaDara Lee
text: Great affordable products and quality customer service

name: lerone35020
text: Family owned and they are wonderful to do business with

name: Don Starkey
text: Knowledgeable, friendly and a great value.

name: fgjr96way
text: MY favorite place to visit coming from SE Michigan,,they really treat you LIKE FAMILY

name: John Williams Jr.
text: Good place to do business. A lot of bang for your buck

name: Angela Ambitious Angels
text: We love everything about this business.... they do what they need to do im a timely matter... They assist The Ambitious Angels dance team with trophies/awards and we love them!

name: Orlando Davis
text: Great people!  Great prices!  Even Greater products!

name: J Doe
text: We had a last minute order and Custom Trophies met our need within two days. Excellent customer service.

name: Scherian George
text: I love Custom Trophies they do really great work

name: Kimberly Evans
text: They are thorough and quick. Very nice people.

name: antonio levert
text: Nice Prices And Selection

name: Ryan Funk
text:
I have been using this place for a few years now for awards for the group I direct. I have always been pleased with the results. They are very good at walking you through the process if you aren't sure what specifically you want. The quality of the awards they have are very good.
If you are looking for something other than plaques, trophies, etc. (like towels or shirts) they have contacts they work with that also give good products.
Check this place out if you need awards, etc. for you group.

name: Summer Whatley
text: Nice people and great work!

name: Toni Peoples
text: My visit was so successful! The nice young lady got me in 30 min before closing for an engrave! Very impressed and thankful for this business!

name: Jacque Hays
text: Love this place.  The lady that owns it is a sweet heart.

name: Sondra Cooper
text: These ladies are precious!!!  Love this place.

name: John Petersen
text: Great local place to get shirts. I personally got a jersey ordered for my little there. It was not expensive, very easy, and I didn't have to go through the hassle of shipping. Would recommend.

name: Jennifer Streeter
text: Food was okay. Drinks was excellent. Service was good.

name: Cox and Son Machine
text: Grate place and people take them all your printing work.

name: Annette Sipper
text: Great service, very polite and courteous gentleman. Great plaque made.

name: Billy
text: Thry sew things real good.

name: Zatie
text: This my first time going to this establishment since the new owners and I don’t recommend. The lady did not communicate with me regarding my shirts and it left a bad taste in my mouth. Only reason I gave two stars is because the lady at the front was very helpful and sweet.

resp.text: I'm sorry you feel this way and your order didn't go well for you.  Without going back and forth sometimes we do not have a lot of time to search for similar fonts found on the internet.

name: Jenny Spears
text: This place is under new management.

name: Henry Kent
text: I have used Tiger Paw several times for my business apparel needs.  They do a great job, in a timely manner. They have become my go to source.  From 20 to 200 pieces, they have handled our needs exceptionally well.  The staff is professional and courteous.  We could not be happier with the service they provide.  I would highly recommend Tiger Paw for all your custom apparel needs.

name: Shawna Rivers
text: Always friendly & helpful. They always have my items ready on time & its looks great. They can have my business anytime.

name: MaegenMarie Jones
text: Long time established business in Tallassee, always happy to do business with them!

name: Lisa Thomas
text: Always great service, good people

name: Joe Summers
text: Great local company for custom Apparel

name: Tiffany Baker
text: Their work is great.

name: Todd Arthur
text: Awesome service. Even better prices. Very thick smoke smell and the mold was not good. Place is a mess but worth it.

name: Bill Gunter
text: Mark:  Is a great guy and works hard to do a great job and at very fair prices.  Place may be old, due to a landlord who doesn't believe in fixing the place up, but good work comes out of the shop and continue to do business there.

name: Robert Busby
text: This gentleman is very knowledgeable and adept at his craft and does it right!  Highly recommend!

name: Taenga Tuamotus
text: Weird place. Most likely it will be shut down soon. It looks like it’s on it’s last legs.

name: Trudy Maynard
text: Great service. Wonderful staff. Highly recommend for your professional and even personal needs. Stop in for personalized gifts for family and friends. They will not disappoint!

resp.text: Thank you, Trudy for your positive feedback. I'm so glad you have been pleased with our services and we look forward to helping you with future engravings!

name: Bill Creamer
text: Awesome job on memorial plate for my mother. Very nice lady took care of me. Quality and price perfect.

resp.text: Bill, thank you so much for your positive review! We are so glad you were satisfied with your purchase. Let us know if you need anything in the future!

name: Rhonda Sandlin
text: Love this place - they'll know who you are and the shop has a family feel. Great prices - perfect work!

resp.text: Rhonda, thank you so much for your 5 star review! We appreciate your business and look forward to helping you again in the future.

name: Tony Guthrie
text: Great service! Reasonable prices.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review. I'm glad we could help you with your stamping needs. If you need anything further, please give us a call.

name: Melissa Escamilla
text: I was referred to them by our city clerk's office! It is a super chic sweet shop with lots of memorable quotes. Their staff is polite & prompt. They have been in business since before I was born. Local small business with longevity. Definitely worth the stop!

resp.text:
Thank you for the five star review. We are so glad that you enjoyed your visit at our shop and look forward to helping you with all of your rubber stamp needs.  All of our signs with the quotes that you referenced are custom made and we are constantly adding to our
showroom inventory,  so come by soon to see our new items!

name: Aaron Thomas
text: These folks are AMAZING! I had a rushed order and they were patient and acomidating. I would highly recommend them.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Thomas for the 5 star review.  We appreciate the fact that you would recommend our company to others as well. We are glad to hear that you liked your deskplates and that we could make them as fast as you needed them. If you need anything else, please just give us a call.

name: Jeremy Owen
text: Great place, friendly and straight to business. Tried to have a specific stamp made for my co. and 3 other places couldn't get the alignment rite. These guys got it on the first go! Thank you all very much.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words and review! We are glad that you were satisfied with your stamp and the alignment worked for you.   We value your business and look forward to helping you again in the future.

text: Great customer service.

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star review! We appreciate your business and value your opinions.

name: Emily Rogers
text: Wonderful and friendly service. Did a quick turn around project for me and they rocked it!

resp.text: Thank you for your five star rating on our business! We are glad to be able to help and love to hear from our satisfied customers. We appreciate your business!

name: Maria Presson
text: Prompt to service and calling me to let me know it was ready

resp.text: Thank you for our 5 star review. We appreciate your business and look forward to doing business with you in the future as well.

name: Shakira Grimes
text: Nice place got my order done fast!

resp.text: Thank you for your review. We are glad we were able to help you out. We appreciate your business!

name: Brian Nothnagle
text: Excellent customer service and quality engraving!

name: Hamid Baraty
text: Friendly staff, good work
